mapper.select: SELECT p.post_seq , p.post_title , c.post_comment_content , u.user_nickname , IFNULL(c.post_comment_updated_time, c.post_comment_created_time) as lastUpdateTime FROM post_comment c JOIN users u ON c.post_comment_user_seq = u.user_seq JOIN post p ON c.post_seq = p.post_seq WHERE u.user_seq = #{userSeq} LIMIT #{offset}, #{size}
